name: Deadly Greenhouse
description:
Bonus points if you understand all puns.

Deadly Greenhouse Gameplay

You have to survive 5 minutes in the Greenhouse while getting as much cash as possible. Place plants, dodge their attacks, and collect their coins for a profit.

Content
  • 6 different plants to profit from
  • A unique gameplay experience for everyone with various strategies to maximize gain (Feel free to leave your high score in the comments)
  • A 5-minute long custom made song for you to play along
Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • LMB to select and place plants
Spring 2D Jam 2022

This game was created for the Spring 2D Jam 2022 hosted by Theo Clarke. The theme for the jam was Garden. The time limit was 48 hours. This is a solo entry and there are no premade assets.

Credits
  • Game Design: me
  • Code: me (using Unity & Visual Studio 2022)
  • Audio: me (using FL Studio 20 - Producer Edition)
  • Art: me (using Photoshop)
Links
  • My YT channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1Od4iYshEhNFfgUCRr0ccA (Might upload a Devlog for this game there soon. I recorded my entire work process)
  • You can find and download all my music here: https://agentjo.newgrounds.com/
